Date: 2024-10-28 09:55
Subject: Nasco insurance payments 
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop, 

 

Hope all is well. 

 

After we finalize the balance for Nasco at the end of this month, we would like to shift to paying vehicle insurance on a monthly basis. I understand that this may not align with standard insurance practices. 

 

Therefore, I propose that if you can bill us monthly through our BU, and we will make the payments directly Allied. This approach would help us avoid a lump sum payment to Nasco when the annual renewal is due.

 

Please let me know if this arrangement is feasible.

 

Thanks

Arta
